title: AIsilo
description: AIsilo is a decentralized marketplace for AI models and datasets that combines client-side encryption, IPFS storage, and Hedera blockchain for immutable metadata and access control.

title: File It
description: A decentralized, blockchain-based secure data encryption and storage platform. Your data your own, zero knowledge platform.

title: Cohort XIII DAO
description: A simple DAO for managing proposals and voting.

title: Tranzit Mobility
description: A comprehensive transportation management system built with Next.js. Features real-time tracking, route optimization, and seamless user experience for urban mobility solutions.

title: CVD Predictor
description: Machine learning application for cardiovascular disease prediction using Python. Integrates data analysis, predictive modeling, and interactive visualizations to help assess health risks.

title: Smart Farm
description: IoT-based agricultural monitoring system featuring real-time sensor data collection, automated irrigation control, and environmental monitoring for precision farming applications.

title: SealedTrust - Escrow Service on Blockchain
description: Decentralized escrow service built on blockchain technology for secure peer-to-peer transactions. Implements smart contracts for automated dispute resolution and transparent fund management.

title: Automotive E-commerce
description: Modern and intuitive UI/UX design for automotive e-commerce platform. Features product catalogs, shopping cart interface, and checkout flow optimized for automotive parts and accessories.

title: Invoice Application
description: Professional invoicing application with PDF generation, client management, and payment tracking. Built with Next.js for small businesses and freelancers.

title: AI Chatbot
description: Intelligent conversational AI chatbot with natural language processing capabilities. Features context awareness, multi-language support, and seamless integration with messaging platforms.

title: Student Management System
description: Comprehensive student information system for educational institutions. Features enrollment management, grade tracking, attendance monitoring, and automated report generation.

title: Blog
description: Responsive blog platform with content management system, user authentication, and commenting functionality. Built with Next.js for content creators and readers.

title: Cute App for Memories
description: Personal memory sharing application with photo galleries, timeline features, and social sharing capabilities. Designed for preserving and sharing life's precious moments with loved ones.

title: Gesture Based Access Control
description: Advanced access control system using computer vision and gesture recognition. Integrates cameras, microcontrollers, and machine learning algorithms for secure, contactless authentication.

title: Smart City
description: Comprehensive smart city management platform integrating various IoT sensors for traffic monitoring, waste management, environmental tracking, and public safety systems.

title: Sealed Trust
description: A very minimalistic implementation of escrow system on blockchain.

title: Coaching Site
description: Professional coaching website design with modern UI/UX principles. Features service showcases, booking systems, testimonials, and responsive layouts optimized for coaching businesses.

title: Valentino - Web Library
description: Comprehensive design system and component library for web applications. Features reusable UI components, design tokens, style guides, and documentation for consistent brand experiences.

title: To Do App
description: Clean and intuitive task management application design with drag-and-drop functionality, priority systems, and productivity tracking features for enhanced user workflow.

title: Brain Bulb - Social Media
description: Twitter clone design.
